concept.title: 235.010 SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL REPORTS.

conbody.p: (b) For DoD, the Defense Technical Information Center is responsible for collecting all scientific and technical reports. For access to these reports, follow the procedures at PGI 235.010(b).
